dcterms:creator: Tengyuan Liang
Alexander Rakhlin
dcterms:description: A theoretical framework for understanding the generalization properties of kernel ridgeless regression, showing that it can generalize despite being an interpolating estimator.
dcterms:title: Kernel Ridgeless Regression

dcterms:creator: Arthur Jacot
Franck Gabriel
Cl√©ment Hongler
dcterms:description: A kernel that describes the behavior of wide neural networks in the infinite-width limit, providing insights into their convergence and generalization properties.
dcterms:title: Neural Tangent Kernel

dcterms:creator: Behrooz Ghorbani
Song Mei
Theodor Misiakiewicz
Andrea Montanari
dcterms:description: A model that analyzes the behavior of two-layer neural networks in high dimensions, focusing on their interpolation properties.
dcterms:title: Random Features Model

dcterms:creator: Mikhail Belkin
Daniel Hsu
Siyuan Ma
Soumik Mandal
dcterms:description: A study reconciling modern machine learning techniques with the classical bias-variance trade-off, providing insights into high-dimensional linear regression.
dcterms:title: High-Dimensional Linear Regression

dcterms:creator: Vitaly Feldman
dcterms:description: An exploration of the role of memorization in learning, particularly in the context of classification tasks with rare instances.
dcterms:title: Classification with Rare Instances

dcterms:creator: Mikhail Belkin
Siyuan Ma
Soumik Mandal
dcterms:description: A study on the double-descent phenomenon in machine learning, particularly in the context of deep learning and kernel methods.
dcterms:title: Double-Descent Behavior

dcterms:creator: Alexander Rakhlin
Xiyu Zhai
dcterms:description: An analysis of the consistency of interpolation with Laplace kernels in high-dimensional settings, contributing to the understanding of kernel methods.
dcterms:title: Empirical Kernel Matrix
